title: America’s Next Big Thing: Ashlin Barry, the Superstar Junior Who Just Can’t Stop Winning as He Continues the Family Dynasty
content:
USA's junior road and TT champion blew up the road, track, and gravel scene in 2024 and now has medals at Zürch worlds in his sights.

Read the full article at America’s Next Big Thing: Ashlin Barry, the Superstar Junior Who Just Can’t Stop Winning as He Continues the Family Dynasty on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
